data.title: Midsomer Murders (an Episode Guide)
data.meta_description: A guide to this television series with episode descriptions, original air dates, cast listing, writers and directors.
data.text:
NOTES

From Series 7 onwards, the assignment of the episodes to series is debatable, due to the erratic nature of ITV's broadcasts in the UK. Here they are now arranged according to the series in which they are grouped for release on DVD box sets in the UK (which is the same as at IMDb, and which may be the same as production order), as that is what is likely to be of most use now. The UK broadcast order has to be determined from the dates given; broadcast order in other territories may differ again, as may grouping for DVD box sets.

The episodes continue to be released on DVD round the world. As of August 2012:

Episodes 1 to 89 are out on Region 2 PAL disks in the UK

Episodes 1 to 81 are out on Region 1 NTSC disks in N America (82-85 probably due out in Fall 2012)

Episodes 1 to 89 are out on Region 4 PAL disks in Australia

Some novels by Caroline Graham on which the series is based are: The Killings at Badger's Drift [1987], Death of a Hollow Man [1989], Death in Disguise [1992], Written in Blood [1994], Faithful Unto Death [1996], A Place of Safety [1999], and Death's Shadow [?].

There is a behind-the-scenes book, Midsomer Murders [2003], by Jeff Evans.
